sentence.Network_en: The nation's economy is not out of the woods yet.
sentence.Network_cn: 该国经济尚未摆脱困境。

sentence.Network_en: It's so good to see you. What brings you to this neck of the woods?
sentence.Network_cn: 见到你真高兴，哪阵风把你吹来了？

sentence.Network_en: They put up tents on the fringes of the woods.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在树林边缘搭起帐篷.

means.word_mean: 1. large grayish-brown edible fungus forming a mass of overlapping caps that somewhat resembles a hen at the base of trees

auth_sentence.content: The palm, the loftiest dryad of the woods.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The palm, the loftiest dryad of the woods.

auth_sentence.content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.

auth_sentence.content: Steve Herrmann is editor of the BBC News website.
